name: Spellcasting
effects: cantrips: know sorcerer cantrips as shown on the class table
prepared spells: at level 1, prepare two level 1+ sorcerer spells
prepared spells: total prepared spells are shown on the class table
spell slots: per class table; regain all expended slots on a long rest
spellcasting focus: you can use an Arcane Focus
limits: cantrip swap: replace one cantrip when you gain a sorcerer level
prepared spell swap: replace one prepared sorcerer spell when you gain a sorcerer level
prepared spells must be of a level for which you have spell slots
always prepared: spells from other sorcerer features are always prepared and don't count against prepared spells
notes: See chapter 7 for general spellcasting rules and the Sorcerer spell list in this chapter.
